meanings.sent1: The ancient artifact found in the cave was cryptogenic, baffling archaeologists.
meanings.sent2: The cryptogenic manuscript was discovered in a hidden compartment of the library.
meanings.sent3: The cryptogenic cat suddenly appeared in the garden, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her cryptogenic smile hinted at a mysterious past.
meanings.sent5: The cryptogenic fog enveloped the town, shrouding it in secrecy.

meanings.definition: Relating to or denoting a disease of unknown cause.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with a cryptogenic illness that puzzled medical experts.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are studying the cryptogenic condition to uncover its origins.
meanings.sent3: The cryptogenic flu spread through the school, causing confusion among students.
meanings.sent4: Her cryptogenic symptoms mirrored those of a rare disease.
meanings.sent5: The cryptogenic outbreak left the town in a state of uncertainty.
